ED_Title: Comprehensive  review of the whole question of peacekeeping operations in all their aspects
ED_DecisionText:
At its 52nd plenary meeting, on 12 December 2022, the General Assembly took note of the report of the Special
Political and Decolonization Committee (Fourth Committee).  (Footnote: A/77/401.)
ED_Disclaimer: The final version of decisions adopted during the main part of the session will be contained in document A/77/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
